name: Smash Court 3
overview: Smash Court 3 is the third and latest game for the Playstation One console, the series continues in Playstation 2 & PSP consoles. This game was only released on Japan (Smash Court 1 & 2 were released in Europe as Namco Tennis Smash Court & Anna Kournikova's Smash Court Tennis). The game has 24 different characters (male and female ones), the player can choose if he wants a left handed or right handed character. There are 3 Computer opponent difficulty levels (easy, normal or hard), new game modes and new courts like the Moon one, Dance Hall, etc. The game features cartoon graphics and a challenge gameplay the is easy to control but takes time to master. Up to 4 human players can play the game at the same time using the multi-tap function (In cooperatives and vs modes). Game Modes: - Exhibition Mode: Choose a court from the ones that the game has, and play a singles or doubles tennis game, with up to 4 human players at the same time. - Mission 10: A 1 player challenge to pass 10 different tennis technicles tests. - Mini Games: Play wacky mini games like a SQUSHooting, Hamburger & Bomb. - Free Training: Learn all the moves that you will need in the main game.
